about_the_game:
Into the Rhythm VR is a drumming experience brought to virtual reality. You are given drum sticks along with 6 drums. Follow the dropping notes to play the awesome music you always wanted. All you need is a place to sit, and motion controllers to strike with rhythm!



Key Features


  • Just because they are shaped like drums, it doesn't mean you have to play drums! EDM? Heavy Metal? Play any music you like!
  • We provide with 20 original tracks
  • Variety of drum sticks and drum sets
  • Not satisfied with just 20 songs? Don't worry we provide you with the editor to create your own tracks both on your computer and VR!
  • With the tools we provide, you can insert music that you like, and make the drums play the sound that you want!
  • Once you finish creating your beautiful tracks, you can choose to share them with the world!

detailed_description:
Note for 2020 Winter Update

Dear Drummers,

Welcome to the 2020 winter update of Into the Rhythm VR!
As we mentioned, we are bringing you the new features and content.
Please see the changes we have made below.

1. More Speed Options.
As we promised, we have added 4 more speed options: x4, x6, x8, x10. With those speed options, we expect you to play difficult levels much easier since you will be able to see the gaps between notes more clearly.
Plus, we have implemented memory function which will keep your speed setting in a next round.

2. Fever System
Also, we have added the fever feature that multiplies your score depending on your accuracy. It will be activated when you fulfill the fever gauge on the right in a designated time. The bonus will be increased from x2 to x2.5 and finally x3 by consecutive fever.

3. Auto Chart (Beta)
Enjoy your favorite songs on Into the Rhythm VR without complicated procedures! By putting your .mp3, .wav or .ogg files in the ‘sounds’ folder, the game will make a chart by itself. We are still improving the algorithms for better accuracy, and will let you know when it works.

4. Additional Song
New track ‘Carol of the bells - Zero Cover’ is added. Not like previous songs, we focused more on implementing drum patterns, especially in the hard level. Please share your opinion about it.

5. Bug fix and optimization.
There are many fixes in this update, but below two are the most important parts.
a. Key sound issue: Each note in the original tracks will make a sound correctly when you hit it.
b. lighting Optimization: We have removed heavy graphic effects and resources, so the workload is significantly reduced(loading time and input latency is reduced as well).

There are more things coming for you, so stay tuned.
Oh, and we wish you a happy X-mas and a new year.

Thank you
